text: What changed with Forms over the past 2 weeks? The code output was modified, which results in breaking changes without warning. The form id's went from `hsForm_XXXXX-XXXX` to `hsForm_XXXXX-XXXX-ejife_XXXXX-XXXX-fwef`. Any info about this?
Hi all, Is it possible to create language specific menu on the HubSpot's site search results page?

Hey <@UL1S6TULB> It could be related to a change on the last annnouncment here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/august-22nd-roundup-3-new-updates> It certainly wasn’t meant to be a breaking change where we were falling back to using the form instance id if there was one (since it was part of the id of the form) but it’s possible that didn’t happen.  Can you DM the specific form and the id you were expecting and I can have the forms team look into to see if this was the issue?
See the comments... <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Deprecation-Notice-formInstanceId-is-no-longer-required/m-p/287516#M26601>
Thanks, this looks like it’s related
Hello, Does any know if it is possible to download all top folders from a portal using cms-cli? it seems like i can only fetch one folder at a time
If you’re using the latest version (0.0.22), you should be able to use `hscms fetch /` although we have noticed a few problems with some types of assets (in particular drag-and-drop templates)
Hi everyone, anyone with experience with google analytics (User id and ecommerce), can anybody help me with woocomerce?
potentially - what are you looking to do?
Hi <@UMDH1NFUJ>, I try to track the actions *add to cart*, *init checkout*,  *purchase*  to users registered using *user id* and track actions *add to cart* to visitors
Has anyone heard any news on whether or not HubSpot will be supporting SMART CONTENT in custom modules anytime soon?
It is a much asked addition
The squeaky wheel gets the grease.  Let’s keep asking. :slightly_smiling_face:
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C26E7JT8V/p1565282954082100>
is there way using HubL to get the count of people in a list?
I'm not sure but this may be what you're looking for. Especially the index part. <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/for-loops>

basically we have a voting competition going on where people will vote for A or B and we have them being segmented into a Contact List and I need to be able to display the number of people who voted for A or B.. unless there is an easier way to do this. I know we can use an API but we are trying to avoid that
as far as I'm aware, you would need to use the API to get this live.

Hey, for the purpose of a mega menu, what's the best way in HS to make the dropdown menu items have an active state so they stay open without a hover? I have a menu constructed but items only show when I hover on them (like normal). Any help would be appreciated!
Just hash should work
create a custom modle and use the `{{ menu() }}` field in a for loop
# doesn't make the submenu items be active / open automatically.

If you are answering my mega menu question, can you give a little more detail? I have the full menu built but just want the mega menu type functionality on ONE of the menu items. The rest have standard dropdowns.
`{% for item in menu('MENUID') %} STUFF HERE {% endfor %}`

:sprocket-dance: *Anyone need an INBOUND community pass?*
I have a few for our developer friends, DM me for details :slightly_smiling_face: :raised_hands:
typically done via toggling a class on the menu, but for what you're looking for, you may want to look at making a Vue module

Must be built into our framework, because all we have to do is go into advanced menus, select URL and #. It opens the mega dropdown. Here is an example of a site we did a few years ago. <https://www.myheartland.bank>
